text: Simo Veli Atte Salminen (8 November 1932 – 2 September 2015) was a Finnish comic-actor. He was best known for his many performances in movies and television shows by Spede Pasanen. He was known for his roles in Pähkähullu Suomi and in Koeputkiaikuinen ja Simon enkelit. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Finnish movie actors Category:Finnish comedians
title: Simo Salminen
